page.title: 14 WE BELONG TO THE CUBS
page.content: Our cub pack has 32 boys aged between 8 and 10 years old.It is divided into two packs the bears and the lions.The lions meet on Wednesday and the bears meet on Thursday in the cub hall.Our uniform has a blue and green scarf, the blue stands for water and the green stands for land.The lions have a lady Akela and the bears have a man Akela who are in charge.We have a grand howl at the beginning and the end of the meeting when we sit round in a circle.We work for badges and a bronze,silver and gold arrow.I am James and I am working for my photo- graphy badge and Colin has just earnt his artists badge.We go out to track and cook and we also go away to camp and have cooking competitions.We enjoy playing cub games like elephant,storm- troopers and rebels and British bull- dog.
